TopicTitle: Shelley Space Program: Project Kerman Pt. 3 (Stream Starts at 8 PM EST)

Articles.Content:
So IÃ¢â‚¬â„¢m working on another night of booze and rocketry with the Shelley Space Program. This time we will finish the construction of the Kerman Station and switch out the Expedition I crew after their 5 day stay. At the end of the night we should have a new crew, new modules, a new project and more adventures with Jeb, Newbro and the rest! Come on by after the official KSP stream, pop open a cold one, and watch me try and combine science and booze in a spectacular show, it starts at 8 PM EST, 5 PM PST. If you are interested will post a gallery of the screen shots later from the previous episode.
